title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.1 - Stevedores required to be licensed; employment of unlicensed stevedores prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.1 - Stevedores required to be licensed; employment of unlicensed stevedores prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall act as a stevedore within the Port of New

York District without having first obtained a license from the commission, and
no person shall employ a stevedore to perform services as such within the Port
of New York District unless the stevedore is so licensed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
